LanguageData.HaDr.UseVanillaEyesGameActive: Use vanilla eyes (requires reloading the save to take effect)
LanguageData.HaDr.InjuryHealingPointsTT: How much health is healed on a random injury(default 5)
LanguageData.HaDr.InjuryHealingCostTT: How much DragonBlood it costs to heal an injury(default 0.02)
LanguageData.HaDr.ThresholdToBeConsideredDamagedTT: When is a body part considered damaged? (starts DragonBlood healing)(default 0.5)
LanguageData.HaDr.ThresholdToBeConsideredHealedTT: When is a body part considered healed? (stops DragonBlood healing)(default 1)
LanguageData.HaDr.DragonBloodGainFromDragonRageTT: On each final DragonRage hit, gain how much DragonBlood?(default 0.1)
